Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: STA 3032 with a grade "C" (2.0) or better;

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Three functional classifications are covered: planning, design and operation of transportation facilities. Emphasis is on the highway transportation mode.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Civil, Environmental, and Construction Engineering

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: TTE 4274  with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better and department consent.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Project design course covering principles/techniques of planning, traffic analysis, and highway design. Including projecting traffic volumes, laying out alternative routes, designing of alignments/intersections.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Civil, Environmental, and Construction Engineering

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: TTE 3810 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Qualitative and quantitative approaches to contemporary transportation challenges, including economic theory, optimization algorithms, statistical methods, and sustainable transportation alternatives.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Civil, Environmental, and Construction Engineering

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text:
Earn a minimum grade of C in each of the following: 
TTE3810 - Highway Engineering (3)

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Topics including transportation planning, Intelligent Transportation Systems, highway capacity, and traffic safety.  Highway construction, freight, and mass transportation may be covered as time permits.
